descriptions: You can download a trial version of this app to try it for 30 minutes for free.
You won’t be charged anything when this free trial ends. You can’t make in-app purchases or use add-on content during this free trial, but you’ll keep any achievements you earn.

display_long_description:
In a solar system fracturing under expansion, your mech is your lifeline. Reach out and use every switch and control to outmaneuver and overwhelm the enemy with 40 tons of precision. The battlefield is a shifting code, and adaptation is key. 
[media]
Every component in your mech, and how you choose to build and modify it, can mean life or death. Form an elite 4v4 squad across all platforms. Strap in and join the Rebellion!
[media]
No extra gear needed—just your VR headset. We built this for the next generation of cockpit enthusiasts. Reach out, grab the sticks, flip the switches, and if things go south, hit the big red button.
[media]
Iron Rebellion is built by a small and passionate indie team. Your voice matters! If you have any questions or recommendations, feel free to reach out directly on 
Discord: https://discord.gg/WJKSETT
[media]
